EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #22.2019 Dealer Update #22
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - November 25, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | November 2019 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins, with more coming in the next few weeks:
- 2019-25 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-25 Rev B JetWave_Satellite Communications System.pdf]]>JetWave Satellite Communications System for Business Aircraft - 2020-12 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-12 Rev - Primus EPIC Embraer Lineage 1000 ADS-B Out Upgrade Sales Bulletin.pdf]]> Primus EPIC Embraer Lineage 1000 ADS-B Out Upgrade - 2020-17 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-17 RDR4000 Trade-In Promotion for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> RDR4000 Trade-In Promotion
Dealers can find 2019 and 2020 sales bulletins on MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQ00VCX0ZNE00G000000]]> under Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
